content: अनुमुद् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (<ab>P.</ab> in epic poetry) {@--1@} To rejoice with, join in rejoicing or sympathizing with; मुदितामनुमोदते <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--2@} To express approval; तदेव राममातृभिरनुमोदितं <ls>U. 2</ls>; approve, second, applaud; निषेद्धुमासीदनुमोदितुं वा <ls>R. 14. 43</ls>; to allow with pleasure, permit; अनुमोदितमाचार्यैः <ls>K. 77</ls>; अननुमोदितामात्रा <ls n="K.">160.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To gladden, delight, favour, permit.
